tweet: Small businesses are the backbone of Idaho’s economy, which is why I introduced two bipartisan bills this week to facilitate more early stage capital to Idaho #smallbiz and ensure that more federal resources reach start-ups and entrepreneurs throughout the Gem state.

Today I voted to support the FY 2020 #NDAA to modernize our military infrastructure and offer critical assistance to military families, all while providing our troops with the largest pay raise in a decade. #SupportOurTroops pic.twitter.com/nLYiy2IYhA

Spent the day with students from @uidaho. They had the opportunity to tour the Capitol, meet my staff, and sit in on my meetings with Idahoans and the @SenateForeign. I commend these students for their hard work and dedication, and wish them luck in their future endeavors. pic.twitter.com/9YIDykw8MC

We will be scheduling a @SenateForeign committee hearing to discuss AUMF in the weeks after July 4th recess. I commend @SenToddYoung for his dedication to this important issue and, as I promised, we will have a thorough hearing on this matter. https://twitter.com/SenToddYoung/status/1143595020131471362 …

Had dinner last night w/@BillGates. Every time I meet w/ him I come away w/ a comfortable feeling that there are people in the world who care deeply about humanitarian issues & raising the standard of living & quality of life for everyone on the planet. Thank you for your vision.

The Senate has confirmed @INL's Dr. Rita Baranwal to Asst. Sec. for Nuclear Energy. She's a respected leader in the field, driving much of INL's recent cutting-edge work. I'm confident she'll excel in her new role & I congratulate her on this achievement. https://www.risch.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/pressreleases?ID=ED352177-EC29-457B-A6DA-DD681B1C666B …

The Idaho Women’s Business Center is coming to Idaho to serve female entrepreneurs & business owners. Glad the Hong Kong government has postponed consideration of its extradition bill - this is a step in the right direction. I congratulate and continue to support the vigilant protestors there and ultimately urge the bill be withdrawn. #HongKongProtest

Thank you @POTUS for approving @GovernorLittle’s federal disaster declaration to provide vital assistance to communities in north central Idaho affected by severe flooding in April. This will greatly aid state & local recovery efforts throughout the region.

Congratulations to @MeridianLibrary on being honored today in Washington, DC with the @US_IMLS 2019 National Medal for Museum and Library Service, an award reserved for museums and libraries providing outstanding service to their communities.

Thank you to @IvankaTrump @SenCapito & @SenatorShaheen for your work on this effort & for today’s discussion about women’s crucial role in securing international peace & security. #WPS pic.twitter.com/mhB9aVBVwr
The U.S. has put forward a robust bipartisan strategy to ensure that women throughout the world have a seat at the table when discussing matters of security & defense. pic.twitter.com/gVbKo2OChE

It’s proven that women’s presence & empowerment at the negotiation table helps foster stability & peace throughout the world. Women are the backbone of our societies, yet in areas of the world experiencing extreme conflict, women bear an outsized share of the violence.

This summer, my DC, Idaho Falls & Senate Foreign Relations offices have hired eight talented interns hailing from all across Idaho. This group of interns is well-qualified and I know they'll do a great job serving Idaho.

An incredible account from a D-Day veteran from Rexburg. A paratrooper at age 17, he and the rest of the 101st Airborne Division helped secure bridges leading into Normandy. Today, he is back in France for #DDay75 https://www.idahopress.com/news/state/rexburg-d-day-veteran-heading-back-to-france-for-anniversary/article_3f8092ad-795d-5884-ba07-8a12966bc554.html …

75 years ago today, young men from every corner of our nation stormed the beaches of Normandy. With the eyes of the world upon them, they secured one of the most pivotal victories of #WWII. Their stunning courage and sacrifice will never be forgotten. #DDay75 pic.twitter.com/t97FBFeLbQ

Idaho’s dairy farmers keep our state’s economy thriving & go above & beyond providing the country with milk, cheeses, yogurts & other dairy products. In honor of #NationalDairyMonth, thank your local dairy farmer for their hard work & for all they bring to the table.
